hedline.hl1: Metro Business; Print and Dot-Com Team

abstract.p: Primedia, parent company of New York magazine, selects MLX.com to power Web site database used in magazine's new real estate section (S)

block.p: Primedia, the parent company of New York magazine, has selected MLX.com, an online real estate company, to power its Web site's database, which will include listings for hundreds of apartments for rent and sale each week, officials said yesterday.

Primedia, the parent company of New York magazine, has selected MLX.com, an online real estate company, to power its Web site's database, which will include listings for hundreds of apartments for rent and sale each week, officials said yesterday.

The deal will also make New York magazine, which recently started a new real estate section, the only print outlet for MLX's expansive database of listings. Readers will be able to browse virtually the same listings in print and online editions of New York magazine. But more detailed information will be available at the Web site, www.nymag.com, including floor plans, pictures and descriptions of properties. In a 180-degree turn on the general way online and print media have co-existed, the print version of New York magazine will become a portal to attract people to the online version.
